claim_reports.claim_text: An increasing number of Americans have started participating in more sports, fitness, and recreation in recent years.
claim_reports.verdict_summary: The evidence presents a mixed picture regarding participation in sports, fitness, and recreation among Americans. While the SFIA report indicates stable participation in team sports at 70.8 million in 2022, other sources, such as the Outdoor Participation Trends Report and the SFIA study, show significant increases in outdoor recreation and overall sports participation, with 242 million active participants in 2023, marking a 12.1% increase. Additionally, Statista and another SFIA report suggest a steady growth in overall participation rates, indicating that while team sports may not be increasing, broader engagement in sports and fitness activities is on the rise.

higher vo2 max means you can run faster for longer so a 25% increase means you can run about 20% further in the same amount of time after one year of regular exercise your bones will be denser which
